entry.title: Git Marge Master to a Branch
entry.content: git checkout branch_1 git merge master git push git checkout master

entry.title: Switching Git Server
entry.content:
``` git remote -v

git branch

git remote add bitbucket git@bitbucket.org:<>/<>

git remote rm origin

git remote rename bitbucket origin

git push -u origin —all ```

entry.title: Git Ignore the File Permission(mode) Changes
entry.content: git config core.filemode false git config --global core.filemode false # for global

entry.title: Add Global Git Ignore
entry.content:
``` git config —global core.excludesfile ~/.gitignore

echo .tags >> ~/.gitignore echo .tags_sorted_by_file >> ~/.gitignore echo .gemtags >> ~/.gitignore echo .sublime-project >> ~/.gitignore echo .sublime-workspace >> ~/.gitignore echo andy_doc >> ~/.gitignore echo andy_pass >> ~/.gitignore ```

entry.title: Git Checkout Branch From a Tag
entry.content:
after you clone a git repo ``` git checkout -b my_new_branch my_tag

git push origin my_new_branch ```
